mainTitle: Parties or peacefulness? Bali has it all
metaDescription: With volcanic mountains, iconic beaches and coral reefs surrounded by endless rice paddies, Bali is the epitome of tropical paradise. The Island of the Gods has something to offer for everyone from adventurous backpackers to luxury and relax seeking holiday-makers.
metaTitle: Do not miss your chance to visit Bali
name: Bali
